participant_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, enjoys engaging conversations and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I m still single at the age of 35. I teach both japanese and drawing classes. My dog s name is wonwon. I came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and fun-loving, enjoys socializing and spending time at the beach.
participant_2.background: My major is business. I like to party. I love the beach. I am in college. I work part time at a pizza restaurant.

content.text: Pretty good, just got back from the beach.
Nice! I'm going to the beach tomorrow, what's it like out there?
It's beautiful, the weather is perfect.
That's awesome, I'm excited to go.
You'll have a lot of fun, I'm sure.
Thanks! I'm hoping to get some sun and maybe go for a swim.
That sounds like a great plan.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to parties and hang out with friends.
Me too! I love going to parties and dancing.
I'm not a great dancer, but I have fun anyway.
That's all that matters! I'm not a great dancer either, but I love it.
We should go to a party together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to go to a party with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm going to the next one.
Sounds good! I'll see you then.
